name: Bernadette McDaid
background: Bernadette McDaid serves as Commissioning Editor at National Geographic UK. Focus areas: Natural history, science, adventure, specialist factual. They are looking for: Premium factual with global relevance; conservation and environmental storytelling; adventure docs.
thematic_priorities: Adventure documentaries featuring extreme locations or challenges
Character-driven factual with authentic expertise and passion
Science programming focused on exploration and discovery
format_specifications: Series (4–6 episodes) with clear thematic focus
budget_parameters: Documentary: £200K–£400K per hour; Specialist Factual: £250K–£500K+ per hour
submission_process: One-page outline with premise, format and visual approach
Key talent and production team credentials
additional_info: Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach; Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen; Encouragement of sustainable production practices; Support for projects across the UK; Open to pitches from independent producers/companies.
